title: 10/16: Waiver Wire - Return of the Mack! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Chris Godwin, O.J. Howard and Marlon Mack will headline your Waiver Wire, but who else can help you in Week 7 and beyond? First we discuss if you should drop the BAL and CHI defenses (4:00) before revealing our top Waiver Wire priorities (4:53) and getting into the big news (8:50) which of course includes a Le'Veon Bell story ... A sneak peak at the Waiver Wire for each position (12:30) as the guys can't agree on the #1 QB to add this week, and we recap SF-GB (20:42) and KC-NE (23:30). What the heck happened to Alfred Morris!? Why can't Aaron Jones get more work? ... Dropometer (28:30)! Then it's time for Waiver Wire QBs (34:23) including Baker Mayfield and Mitchell Trubisky, RBs (37:35) including Latavius Murray and Peyton Barber, WRs (44:20) including Chester Rogers and Taylor Gabriel, TEs (53:00) including Howard and Austin Hooper, plus deep league targets at each position and DST, IDP and Kicker help at the end of the show ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
